product_name: MPOWERD Luci Aura Inflatable Solar Lantern
long_description: At home indoors and out, this solar-powered LED lantern casts light in 8 different hues (including white) for playful easy-to-use illumination without burning kerosene or spillable wax.
short_description: At home indoors and out, this solar-powered LED lantern casts light in 8 different hues (including white) for playful easy-to-use illumination without burning kerosene or spillable wax.
